name: Silver Tier Membership
description: Unlock essential benefits and start your VIP journey with our Silver Tier. Enjoy discounts and special member perks.
benefits: Receive a small complimentary popcorn during your birthday month.
Early access to ticket sales for select blockbuster screenings.
Exclusive member-only newsletters with upcoming movie news and special offers.
Accumulate points for every purchase, redeemable for snacks or future tickets.

name: Gold Tier Membership
description: Elevate your cinema experience with enhanced perks, greater savings, and exclusive access.
benefits: 15% discount on all movie tickets and all concession items.
Receive a free medium birthday combo (popcorn + drink) during your birthday month.
24-hour priority booking window for all new movie releases.
Access to the exclusive Members Lounge at select Sinefolis locations.
Earn 2x bonus points on all purchases made at Sinefolis Cinemas.
Invitations to special member-only screenings and film events.

name: Platinum Tier Membership
description: Indulge in the ultimate luxury cinema experience with our premium Platinum Tier, offering top-tier benefits and services.
benefits: 20% discount on all movie tickets and all concession items.
Receive a free large birthday combo and a complimentary movie ticket during your birthday month.
48-hour unlimited priority booking window for all movies.
Full access to VIP Lounge & dedicated Concierge Service at all Sinefolis locations.
Complimentary valet parking service (where available at cinema locations).
Exclusive invitations to movie premieres and filmmaker Q&A sessions.
Personalized welcome gift upon joining the Platinum Tier.
Dedicated customer support line for Platinum members.
